message: @jheath thanks. Watching all the videos might take too much time, would be better to view slides first, though
my misunderstanding ... I don't know about the status of slides
maybe I can just wait for several days when all the speakers go back home and have a good rest and put up their slides online :)
@number5 your best bet is to go to each relevant talk thread and ask for the slides if nobody already did
Tutorial instructors were not required to provide organizers with slides and, generally speaking, slides from tutorials might not make much sense.
As for the talks and keynotes -- all speakers were asked to give slides, so I guess most of the slides will end up on the pycon site at some moment in the future
